@mondoman, I say your 12, maybe 15, because your idea of some kind of witty insult is to string together 16 swears and think you just like said something meaningful. You really got me on that last post, real good one. Thats usually how 15 year olds insult people because they're vocabulary isnt large enough, nor is their grammar good enough, to do otherwise. 
Like i said before, for someone who was so quick to rush to the aid of Bone over a half a sentence insult, if you even want to call it that, on one post, on one movie, that he uploaded, and say how worthless i am, and that i should be appreciative that he uploaded it to begin with, where is your movies that you uploaded? I dont see a single one. All I see you do is take, take, take, take, and take some more, and you dont give shit back. You havent uploaded a single movie, not one. Not even a lousy song. Does your mother not let you use the computer long enough to upload a full movie? If so thats cool, but dont get all holier then thou when you aint contributed squat to this site whatsoever, i dont care if you've been here 100 years. Ya, I havent uploaded thousands of movies, but at least I was uploading back in 2009 when you were still figuring out what a torrent was. And i have another dozen im going to upload tonight, and tommorow, and the day after, while you sit here and string together 23 swears and think it means something because they're swears. Yes, your 15, you think the word cunt and asshole are still a big deal. I have a better word for you, douchebag. See how I put together an entire post, managed to insult you numerous time, and barely had to swear at all? And used correct grammar? Go back to school, learn something. Then you can be a big boy uploader too some day.

@ LukeScooto
I have to ask you something as an impartial party, I don't really see why people bother to react with all that hatred just because of some slander online. It's everywhere, so why bother right?

Why do you care all that much whether people have uploaded good films, bad films, or anything at all? 
Someone (won't bother to scroll down) wrote you a paper about how big of a douche you are, and most likely he probably spent an hour writing that crap as you said.  So why do you bother spending your time to check whether the commenters have downloaded anything or not?

Second thing; why do you care about telling people how terrible their grammar and English in general is when you don't really bother to actually write correctly yourself? 
Can't you all just get along and stop whining about a stupid comment, please. This is getting ridiculous.  :)
